overview: Lt. Robin Crusoe is a navy pilot who bails out of his plane after engine trouble. He reaches a deserted island paradise where he builds a house and begins to adjust to life. He is in for trouble however when a local girl is banished to the island by her father, who then comes after Crusoe.
tagline: It's Shape Up or Ship Out for "Admiral Honey's" all girl navy!
title: Lt. Robin Crusoe U.S.N.
